# heartRate

**Instance Property**

The heart rate value in units of beats per minute (BPM).

## Declaration

```swift
var heartRate: Double { get }
```

## Accessing heart rate data

- **confidence**: The confidence level of the heart rate value.
- **CMHighFrequencyHeartRateDataConfidence**: The level of confidence in the accuracy of the heart rate data.
